medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment by which the sender must uniquely identify the quotation by means of its type and number and when necessary its function.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation:
DTM, A segment specifying general dates and, when relevant, times related to the whole message. The segment must be specified at least once to identify the request date.
Examples of the use of this DTM segment are: Date the quotation was made, and the last date the quotation will be valid.
The Date/Time/Period segment within other Segment group should be used whenever the date/time/period requires to be logically related to another specified data item e.g. Payment due date is specified within the PAT Segment group.

medi:segment.name: Payment instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PAI, A segment requesting or confirming conditions of payment, guarantee and method of payment for the whole quotation, if accepted. An example of the use of this segment is to specify that a documentary credit will be used.

medi:segment.name: Additional information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALI, A segment indicating special conditions related to the total proposed quotation owing to origin, customs preference, or other commercial factors.

medi:segment.name: Item description
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IMD, A segment providing a description common to all line items of the proposed quotation.

medi:segment.name: Information required
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IRQ, A segment to relate information supplied in the quotation back to the request for quotation message to which response is being made.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, used when additional information is needed but cannot be accommodated within other segments. In computer to computer exchanges such text will normally require the received to process this segment manually.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments for giving references and where necessary, their dates, relating to the whole message, e.g. contract number, import/export license number, reservation number.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the reference by its number and where appropriate a line number within a document.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date/time related to the reference.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A segment group to give information about adjustment.

medi:segment.name: Adjustment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: AJT, A segment giving adjustment details.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment giving additional information on the adjustment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments specifying tax related information, and when necessary, the location(s) to which that tax information relates.

medi:segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TAX, A segment specifying a tax type, category and rate, or exemption, relating to the whole order, e.g. Value Added Tax at the standard rate is applicable for all items.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying the amount for the identified tax/fee.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment indicating the location to which the tax or exemption specified in the TAX segment applies, e.g. city or state or country.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments specifying the currencies and related dates/time/period valid for the whole quotation. Currency data may be omitted in national applications, but will be required for international transactions.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, A segment identifying the currencies relevant in the quotation, e.g. the quotation currency. A rate of exchange may be given to convert a reference currency into a target currency.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment to indicate the percentage rise and/or fall of a rate of exchange between two currencies which will trigger a re-negotiation of prices.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date/time/period related to the rate of exchange.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments specifying the terms of payment applicable for the whole order.

medi:segment.name: Payment terms basis
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PAT, A segment identifying the payment terms and date/time basis.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment giving the specific date/time/period, if needed, of any payments, discounts, instalments etc.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment specifying the discount, interest, penalty as well as instalment percentage.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying amounts related to payment discounts, penalties or instalments.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments indicating the terms of delivery for the whole order.

medi:segment.name: Terms of delivery or transport
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TOD, A segment identifying the delivery terms to be used. e.g. UN INCOTERMS code could be used to specify the delivery terms.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying locations relevant to the delivery terms specified in the TOD segment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments providing information relating to equipment identification and ownership, handling and identification of hazardous materials, relating to the whole order.

medi:segment.name: Equipment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQD, A segment to define information regarding equipment to be used in conjunction with the quotation, and if required, to indicate responsibility for supply of the equipment.

medi:segment.name: Handling instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: HAN, A segment providing information on required handling of materials and additionally, if required, identifying hazardous materials in the whole order.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment providing measurement information for the equipment.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, used when additional information is needed but cannot be accommodated within other segments. In computer to computer exchanges such text will normally require the receiver to process this segment manually.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments identifying any rules, laws or regulations with which the supplier must comply to meet requirements, e.g. building regulations, safety requirements, etc.

medi:segment.name: Requirements and conditions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RCS, A segment to enable industry or national requirements to be specified.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the referenced document by its number and, where appropriate, a line number.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment indicating the date/time details relating to the references.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, used when additional information is needed but cannot be accommodated within other segments. In computer to computer exchanges such text will normally require the receiver to process this segment manually.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments identifying classes of pricing in the quotation, quantities or pricing breaks.

medi:segment.name: Additional price information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: APR, A segment to identify pricing information such as a price multiplier, the class or type of trade and additionally identifying the reason for any changes.

medi:segment.name: Price details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PRI, A segment to specify the price type used in the quotation. The price used in the calculation of the line amount will be identified as one of the calculation prices.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to specify pertinent quantities relating to the pricing information.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date/time/period relevant to the pricing information, e.g. period of validity.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to specify amounts relevant relating to the pricing information.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment to identify the quantity or amount ranges to which the additional price information applies.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments specifying delivery limitations.

medi:segment.name: Delivery limitations
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DLM, A segment specifying limitations on quoted delivery.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying monetary amount limitations.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date/time/period related to delivery limitations.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 11: A group of segments identifying the parties with associated information.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation:
NAD, A segment identifying names and addresses of the parties, in coded or clear form, and their functions relevant to the proposed quotation.
Identification of the seller and buyer parties is mandatory for a quotation. It is recommended that where possible only the coded form of the party ID should be specified, e.g. The Buyer and Seller are known to each other, thus only the coded ID is required, but the Consignee or Delivery address may vary and would have to be clearly specified, preferably in structured format.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment giving more specific location information of the party specified in the NAD segment e.g. internal site/building number.

medi:segment.name: Financial institution information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FII, A segment identifying the financial institution (e.g. bank) and relevant account numbers for the seller, buyer and where necessary other parties. e.g. the buyer may provide a choice of financial institutions for direct debit purposes.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 12: A group of segments giving references only relevant to the specified party rather than the whole message.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the reference by its number and where appropriate a line number within a document.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date and/or time related to the reference.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate e.g. Labour Union District.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 13: A group of segments identifying the documentary requirements of the specified party.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment identifying and providing information relating to the documents required by the party specified by the NAD segment. For example, the party may require a Certificate of Analysis.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date and/or time of the document.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 14: A group of segments giving contact details of the specific person or department within the party identified in the NAD segment.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department, and their function, to whom communications should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communications type and number for the contact specified in the CTA segment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 15: A group of segments identifying the mode and means of transport, location and relevant dates and times for transportation, relating to the quotation.

medi:segment.name: Details of transport
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TDT, A segment specifying the mode, means and identification of the transport for the goods being quoted. If required, the carrier's address should be indicated within the NAD Segment group.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to specify pertinent quantities relating to the transportation details TDT.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 16: A group of segments giving the location and date/time information relative to the transportation.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying locations relevant to the transport specified in the TDT segment, e.g. place of departure or border crossing point.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the date/time details of departure and/or arrival of the transported goods for the specified location.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 17: A group of segments identifying the packaging, physical dimensions and marks for goods referenced by the whole quotation.

medi:segment.name: Package
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PAC, A segment specifying the number and type of packages for the whole order, e.g. number and type of pallets.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment specifying physical measurements of packages described in the PAC segment, e.g. package length, weight.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 18: A group of segments specifying the markings and labels on individual physical units.

medi:segment.name: Package identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCI, A segment specifying markings and labels used on individual physical units (packages) described in the PAC segment.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the master label number.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the dates relevant to the package markings.

medi:segment.name: Goods identity number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GIN, A segment identifying the number or ranges of numbers for use with the package markings.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 19: A group of segments specifying delivery schedules relating to quantities, frequencies, dates proposed in the quotation.

medi:segment.name: Scheduling conditions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SCC, A segment specifying the type and status of the schedule being given, and optionally defining a pattern to be established, e.g. firm or proposed delivery schedule for a weekly pattern.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, to give further clarification to scheduling instructions. In computer to computer exchanges such text will normally require the receiver to process this segment manually.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 20: A group of segments to specify the scheduled quantities, date/time of the schedule.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to specify pertinent quantities relating to the schedule and pattern established in the SCC segment, e.g. delivery quantity.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment indicating the date/time details relating to the quantity and schedule used to indicate date/time ranges, e.g. start and end dates for a delivery pattern, or delivery window.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 21: A group of segments specifying allowances and charges in the quotation. The allowance or charge specified within this Segment group may either relate to the total quotation in which case it cannot be overridden at detail level, or it can relate to the line items as a default allowance/charge and can be overridden by the ALC Segment group within the detail section. Where relevant, additional information, tax and alternate currency details are to be indicated in the TAX and MOA segments. The basis for the calculation of the allowance/charge may be a quantity, a percentage, an amount or a rate to be specified in one of the dependent Segment groups.

medi:segment.name: Allowance or charge
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALC, A segment identifying the charge or allowance and, where necessary its calculation sequence.

medi:segment.name: Additional information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALI, A segment indicating that the allowance or charge specified is subject to special conditions owing to origin, customs preference or commercial factors.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment giving validity start/end dates or periods for allowance/charge.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 22: A group of segments specifying the quantity of the allowance or charge with its measure unit specifier. A range to which the allowance or charge applies may be specified e.g. An allowance of a free quantity of 20 pieces may be specified if the goods quantity is greater than 1000 pieces.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment identifying the type of quantity and the quantity related to the allowance or charge.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment specifying, if required, the range to which the allowance or charge applies.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 23: A group of segments specifying the percentage for the allowance or charge, e.g. The allowance/charge amount is calculated as 5% of the goods value or a price reduction of 5% may be specified if the goods quantity is within the range 5 tons to 10 tons.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment identifying the percentage and the percentage basis for the calculation of the allowance or charge.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment specifying, if required, a range for the application of the percentage.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 24: A group of segments specifying a monetary amount for an allowance or charge. A range to which the allowance or charge applies can be specified, e.g. an allowance of BEF 5000 may be specified if goods value is greater than BEF 100000.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment identifying the monetary amount for the allowance or charge.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment specifying, if required, a range for the application of the allowance/charge amount.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 25: A group of segments specifying the rate per unit and basis to which the allowance or charge applies, e.g. The allowance/charge amount is 3 DEM per 10 tons.

medi:segment.name: Rate details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RTE, A segment specifying the rate per unit and the basis for calculation.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment specifying, if required, the range for the application of the allowance/charge rate.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 26: A group of segments specifying tax related information for the allowance or charge.

medi:segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TAX, A segment specifying the tax type, category, and rate, or exemption, related to the allowance or charge.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation:
MOA, A segment specifying the amount for the allowance or charge.
4.1.2 Detail section
Information to be provided in the Detail section:

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 27: FTX-DGS-PAI-DOC-SG28-SG29-SG30-SG31-SG32- SG33-SG34-SG35-SG36-SG37-SG38-SG39-SG42-SG46- SG52-SG54 A group of segments providing details of the individual requested items. There must be at least one occurrence of Segment group 27 within a quotation. This Segment group may be repeated to give sub-line details.

medi:segment.name: Line item
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LIN, A segment identifying the line item by the line number and configuration level, and additionally, identifying the product or service quoted. Other product identification numbers, e.g. Buyer product number, etc. can be specified within the following PIA segment.

medi:segment.name: Additional product id
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PIA, A segment providing either additional identification to the product specified in the LIN segment (e.g. Harmonized System number), or provides any substitute product identification.

medi:segment.name: Item description
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IMD, A segment for describing the product or service being quoted as well as product characteristic. This segment should be used for products or services that cannot be fully identified by a product code or article number.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment enabling the physical measurements of the quoted item to be specified where this is required for full identification of the product. Any measurements must refer to the product in its unpacked form. e.g. thickness of plastic film, length, weight, etc.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment identifying the product quantities e.g. quantity quoted.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment specifying the strength or yield of a product as a percentage, e.g. 80% to indicate the strength of an Acid.

medi:segment.name: Additional information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALI, A segment indicating that the line item is subject to special conditions owing to origin, customs preference, embargo regulations or commercial factors.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying date/time/period details relating to the line item only.

medi:segment.name: Goods identity number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GIN, A segment providing identity numbers to be applied to the goods being quoted.

medi:segment.name: Related identification numbers
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GIR, A segment providing sets of related identification numbers for a line item, e.g. engine numbers, chassis number and transmission number for a vehicle.

medi:segment.name: Quantity variances
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QVR, A segment identifying variances in the quantity quoted.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, used when additional information is needed but cannot be accommodated within other segments. In computer to computer exchanges such text will normally require the receiver to process this segment manually.

medi:segment.name: Dangerous goods
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DGS, A segment to give information on dangerous goods.

medi:segment.name: Payment instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PAI, A segment to give conditions and payment means for the reference item.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment to give movement certificate required for the referenced item.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 28: A group of segments providing product characteristic and product characteristic details.

medi:segment.name: Characteristic/class id
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CCI, A segment to identify product characteristic and, or the characteristic name and characteristic relevance for the business process.

medi:segment.name: Characteristic value
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CAV, A segment to specify common product characteristic by value in either coded from or in free format.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment indicating characteristic value being physical measurement (including measurable quantities and percentages) related to specified product characteristics (for example voltage, percentage of material contained) and where relevant measurement ranges.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 29: A group of segments to specify amounts such as cost breakdown information for tooling cost, material or overhead cost.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to identify the cost of components of a quoted price, e.g. tooling cost, labour, and material cost, etc.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to specify quantities relating to the cost breakdown of the quoted prices.

medi:segment.name: Item description
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IMD, A segment for describing the product or services being detailed in this group.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation:
CUX, A segment identifying currencies relevant to the monetary amounts details. A rate of exchange may be given to convert the currency.
Currency data is usually omitted in national applications but will be required for international transactions.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date/time/period relating to the rate of exchange.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 30: A segment group to give information about adjustment.

medi:segment.name: Adjustment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: AJT, A segment giving adjustment details.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment giving additional information on the adjustment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 31: A group of segments identifying the relevant pricing information for the goods or services quoted.

medi:segment.name: Price details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PRI, A segment to specify the price type and amount. The price used in the calculation of the line amount will be identified as one of the calculation prices.

medi:segment.name: Additional price information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: APR, A segment to identify pricing information such as a price multiplier, the class or type of trade and additionally identifying the reason for any changes.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment to identify the ranges (quantity, amount, etc.) to which the additional price information applies.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, A segment to identify the currencies used in the quotation message.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to identify the date/time/period information related to the price change. e.g. period of validity.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 32: A group of segments giving references and where necessary, their dates.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the reference by its number and where appropriate a line number within a document.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date/time related to the reference.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 33: A group of segments specifying destination and quantity details for consignments involving multi-destination deliveries.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment indicating the location to which part of the consignment is to be delivered.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment specifying the quantity to be delivered to the identified location.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the dates and/or times that the delivery should be made.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 34: A group of segments specifying tax related information, and when necessary, the location(s) to which that tax information relates.

medi:segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TAX, A segment specifying a tax type, category and rate, or exemption, relating to the line item.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying the amount for the identified tax/fee.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment indicating the location to which the tax or exemption specified in the TAX segment applies, e.g. city or state tax.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 35: A group of segments indicating the terms of delivery for the line item where this is different to or not specified within the heading section.

medi:segment.name: Terms of delivery or transport
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TOD, A segment identifying the delivery terms to be used.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying locations relevant to the delivery terms specified in the TOD segment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 36: A group of segments providing information relating to equipment identification and ownership, handling and notification of hazardous materials, relating to the line item where this is different to or not specified within the heading section.

medi:segment.name: Equipment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQD, A segment to define fixed information regarding equipment to be used in conjunction with the ordered item, and if required, to indicate responsibility for supply of the equipment, e.g. a container identification.

medi:segment.name: Handling instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: HAN, A segment providing information on required handling of materials and additionally, if required, identifying hazardous materials in the ordered item.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment providing measurement information for the equipment.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, to give further clarification, when required, to the equipment and handling details. In computer to computer exchanges such text will normally require the receiver to process this segment manually.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 37: A group of segments identifying any rules, laws or regulations with which the supplier must comply to meet requirements e.g. building regulations, safety requirements, etc.

medi:segment.name: Requirements and conditions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RCS, A segment to enable industry or national requirements to be specified.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the referenced document by its number and, where appropriate, a line number.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment indicating the date/time details relating to the references.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, used when additional information is needed but cannot be accommodated within other segments. In computer to computer exchanges such text will normally require the receiver to process this segment manually.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 38: A group of segments specifying the terms of payment for the applicable item.

medi:segment.name: Payment terms basis
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PAT, A segment identifying the payment terms and date/time basis.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment giving the specific date/time/period, if needed, of any payments, discounts, instalments etc.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment specifying the discount, interest, penalty as well as instalment percentage.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying amounts related to payment discounts, penalties or instalments.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 39: A group of segments identifying the packaging, physical dimensions, and marks and numbers for goods referenced in the line item.

medi:segment.name: Package
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PAC, A segment specifying the number of packages and the physical type of packaging for the line item, e.g. pallet type.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment specifying physical measurements of packages described in the PAC segment. e.g. cube or gross weight.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment specifying maximum stack ability and number of articles in a package.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment providing the effective date of the package.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 40: A group of segments giving references e.g. to a packing instruction document relevant to a particular package type and its date/time/period of issue.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the packing instruction document.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date/time related to the referenced document.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 41: A group of segments specifying the markings and labels on individual physical units.

medi:segment.name: Package identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCI, A segment specifying markings and labels used on individual physical units (packages) described in the PAC segment.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the master label number.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the dates relevant to the package markings.

medi:segment.name: Goods identity number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GIN, A segment identifying the number or ranges of numbers for use with the package markings.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 42: A group of segments identifying the parties with associated information, relevant to the line item only.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying names and addresses of the parties, in coded or clear form, and their functions relevant to the line item. It is recommended that where possible only the coded form of the party ID should be specified, e.g. the buyer and seller are known to each other, thus only the coded ID is required, but the consignee or delivery address may vary and would have to be clearly specified, preferably in structured format.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment giving more specific location information of the party specified in the NAD segment e.g. internal site/building number.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 43: A group of segments giving references only relevant to the specified party rather than the whole message.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the reference by its number and where appropriate a line number within a document.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date and/or time related to the reference.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 44: A group of segments identifying the documentary requirements of the specified party.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment identifying and providing information relating to the documents required by the party specified by the NAD segment. For example, the party may require a Certificate of Analysis.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date and/or time of the document.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 45: A group of segments giving contact details of the specific person or department within the party identified in the NAD segment.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department, and their function, to whom communications should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communications type and number for the contact specified in the CTA segment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation:
Segment group 46: A group of segments specifying allowances and charges for an item.
The basis for the calculation of the allowance/charge may be a quantity, a percentage, an amount or a rate in the dependent segment groups.

medi:segment.name: Allowance or charge
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALC, A segment identifying the charge or allowance and, where necessary its calculation sequence.

medi:segment.name: Additional information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALI, A segment indicating that the allowance or charge specified is subject to special conditions owing to origin, customs preference or commercial factors.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to give validity start/end dates or periods for allowance/charge.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 47: A group of segments specifying the quantity of the allowance or charge with its measure unit specifier. A range to which the allowance or charge applies may be specified e.g. An allowance of a free quantity of 20 pieces may be specified if the goods quantity is greater than 1000 pieces.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment identifying the type of quantity and the quantity related to the allowance or charge.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment specifying, if required, the range to which the allowance or charge applies.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 48: A group of segments specifying the percentage for the allowance or charge, e.g. The allowance/charge amount is calculated as 5% of the goods value or a price reduction of 5% may be specified if the goods quantity is within the range 5 tons to 10 tons.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment identifying the percentage and the percentage basis for the calculation of the allowance or charge.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment specifying, if required, a range for the application of the percentage.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 49: A group of segments specifying a monetary amount for an allowance or charge. A range to which the allowance or charge applies can be specified, e.g. an allowance of BEF 5000 may be specified if goods value is greater than BEF 100000.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment identifying the monetary amount for the allowance or charge.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment specifying, if required, a range for the application of the allowance/charge amount.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 50: A group of segments specifying the rate per unit and basis to which the allowance or charge applies, e.g. The allowance/charge amount is 3 DEM per 10 tons.

medi:segment.name: Rate details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RTE, A segment specifying the rate per unit and the basis for calculation.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment specifying, if required, the range for the application of the allowance/charge rate.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 51: A group of segments specifying tax related information for the allowance or charge.

medi:segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TAX, A segment specifying the tax type, category, and rate, or exemption, related to the allowance or charge.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying the amount for the allowance or charge tax.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 52: A group of segments identifying the mode and means of transport, location and relevant dates and times for transportation, relating to the line item, where this is different to or not specified within the heading section.

medi:segment.name: Details of transport
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TDT, A segment specifying the mode, means and identification of the transport for the goods item being ordered, where this is different to or not specified within the heading section.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to specify quantities relevant to transportation, e.g. delivery quantity.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 53: A group of segments giving the location and date/time information relative to the transportation.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying locations relevant to the transport specified in the TDT segment.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the date/time details of departure and/or arrival of the transported goods for the specified location.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 54: A group of segments specifying requested delivery schedules relating to quantities, frequencies, and dates, required for the line item, where this is different to or not specified within the heading section.

medi:segment.name: Scheduling conditions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SCC, A segment specifying the type and status of the schedule being given, and optionally defining a pattern to be established, e.g. firm or proposed delivery schedule for a weekly pattern.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, used when additional information is needed but cannot be accommodated within other segments. In computer to computer exchanges such text will normally require the receiver to process this segment manually.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 55: A group of segments to specify the scheduled quantities, date/time details of the schedule and where required the reference of the schedule.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to specify quantities relating to the schedule and pattern established in the SCC segment, e.g. delivery quantity.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation:
DTM, A segment indicating the date/time details relating to the quantity and schedule details in the SCC/QTY segments. This segment may be repeated to indicate date/time ranges, e.g. start and end dates for a delivery pattern, or delivery window.
4.1.3 Summary section
Information to be provided in the Summary section:

medi:segment.name: Section control
medi:segment.medi:documentation: UNS, A service segment placed before the first user data segment in the summary section.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment giving the total amounts for the whole message.

medi:segment.name: Control total
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CNT, A segment by which control totals may be provided by the sender for checking by the receiver.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 56: A group of segments to summarize the allowances and charges, Monetary amounts for the entire quote.

medi:segment.name: Allowance or charge
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALC, A segment identifying the charge or allowance type to be summarized.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying the summary amount for the allowance or charge.

medi:segment.name: Additional information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALI, A segment indicating that allowance or charge specified is subject to special conditions owing to the origin, customs preference or commercial factors.
